name: alcatel Idol 2 Mini
description: alcatel Idol 2 Mini Android smartphone. Announced 2014, February. Features 3G, 4.5″ IPS LCD capacitive touchscreen, 8 MP camera, Wi-Fi, GPS, Bluetooth.

Body.SIM: Single SIM (Micro-SIM) or Dual SIM (Micro-SIM, dual stand-by)

Platform.OS: Android OS, v4.3 (Jelly Bean), upgradable to v4.4 (KitKat)

Memory.Card slot: microSD, up to 32 GB (dedicated slot) - single-SIM model
Memory.Internal: 4 GB, 1 GB RAM (Single SIM)/ 8 GB, 1 GB RAM (Dual SIM)

Camera.Features: Geo-tagging, touch focus, face detection, panorama, HDR

Comms.WLAN: Wi-Fi 802.11 b/g/n, Wi-Fi Direct, DLNA, hotspot

Features.Messaging: SMS(threaded view), MMS, Email, Push Email, IM
Others: Active noise cancellation with dedicated mic

Battery.Stand-by: Up to 450 h (2G) / Up to 400 h (3G)
Battery.Talk time: Up to 12 h (2G) / Up to 5 h (3G)
